channel.title: Multiple Axoloti Boards accessed by raspberry pi
channel.description:
Hi All,
I'm building a live jam controller using a raspberry pi and some midi controllers. I have 1 axoloti working well with it and I can attach multiple axoloti boards, but I need a reliable way to distinguish between the axoloti boards. So far I cannot get any unique identifier with the normal alsa tools. Has anyone dealt with this?

item.title: Multiple Axoloti Boards accessed by raspberry pi
item.dc:creator: @janvantomme Jan Vantomme
item.description:
@janvantomme wrote:

The Axoloti patcher software differentiates between different boards using libusb.

github.com

axoloti/axoloti/blob/7975cc876a9b7e5bf64d88533607948da97a7d4d/src/main/java/axoloti/dialogs/USBPortSelectionDlg.java
